New Records: USA won their first two games in a T20 World Cup competition
Key Match Events: USA defeated Pakistan in the T20 Cricket World Cup with a stunning super over win
Babar Azam and Shadab Khan's recovery partnership of 72 allowed Pakistan to post a competitive 159-7
Monank Patel scored an impressive 50 and Andries Gous chipped in with a very handy 35 for USA
Aaron Jones fired a quick 36 runs, including two sixes for USA
Saurabh Netravalkar bowled well in a pressured situation for USA
Pre-Game Insights: Experts' predictions or expectations were not mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: This defeat leaves Pakistan struggling to qualify for the Super 8 stage, with a win against India likely to be needed for them to progress
For the USA, they also face India in their next fixture, but victory in their final group game against Ireland should be enough to see them through to the Super 8 stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 Cricket World Cup is being co-hosted by the USA and other countries
The tournament features a shorter format of cricket in which each side has one innings of up to 20 overs
The USA now stand a strong chance of qualifying for the Super 8 round
Others: The article mentions that West Indies are also hosting matches, with games across the Caribbean
The USA's victory over Pakistan was one of the biggest shocks in cricket history
